works.title: Cosmetico
works.about: An all-purpose e-commerce template is characterized by universality, attractiveness and easy customization. It is not only visually appealing, but also follows the newest trends in coding with the use of html5, css3 and flex. 5 pages are featured: "Main", "Contacts", "Products", "Product description", "Shopping card"

works.title: Portfolio
works.about: A simple template that will be helpful for freelancers or other people who want to display their skills, education, personal information, etc. Clean and maintainable code together with responsive design will represent your best self

works.title: NatGeo
works.about: A stylish and modern redesign of the famous "National Geographic". Not responsive, but implemented with pure CSS3 and HTML5. Semantic tag names, bullet-proof code, accessibility, reusable CSS code, cross-browser

works.title: Mango shop
works.about: A simple e-commerce template in pure CSS3 and HTML5. Semantic tag names, accessibility, image optimization and sprites, cross-browser

works.title: Remote workers
works.about: A stylish professional responsive template intended for education portals. Showcases large persona feature, rating/prices and news sections. This cross-browser compatible responsive template could be the noble choice for any platform: desktop, mobiles or tablet

works.title: FlatTool
works.about: A professional responsive template featurng "Flat Design". Perfectly suitable for desing agencies and creative studios. This HTML5 and CSS3 template is will be surprisingly easy to modify for your project needs

works.title: Yourlogo
works.about: A Bootstrap-based website template that's suitable for a single-page website. This template has minimalist design and smooth scrolling animation. Sections include benefits, partners, iPhone carousel gallery and contact form. The project is responsive, cross-browser, features gorgeous animations and uses the "Owl Carousel" plugin for slider

works.title: Octavia
works.about: A landing page to use for your personal and commercial projects, fully editable, super clean and modern, super white. Features a parallax image in the header, animated counters and description blocks. It can be customized easily to suit your wishes. Responsive and simple

works.title: Spirit8
works.about: A clean professional corporate multipurpose template for agencies and creative studios inspired by the "Flat Design" trend. Adoptable to any type of website. This web template look as if it has a really fancy style, however it is easy to adopt to particular needs. Spirit 8 was built with Bootstrap grid system and modern libraries

works.title: Free-Office
works.about: A great responsive template. This clean yet elegant project was developed using Bootstrap a grid system. This template is perfect for any business: ranging from a multi-billion corporation to a small shop - or simply to introduce your garage band to the world. Extra download speed achieved through optimization, sprites and code minification

works.title: Profile
works.about: It will be useful for artists, photographers, creative agencies, digital studios, personal freelancers, and any kind of business owners that would like to showcase their portfolio beautifully. It’s fully responsive design, looks stunning on any device and perfect for showcasing your work

works.title: Treehouse
works.about: It's a web template that was designed with agencies and small companies in mind. This is bright and spacious design perfect for people or startup companies looking to showcase their apps or other projects. You can use this template for any type of websites. It's template is cross-browser compatible and responsive

works.title: Freelancer
works.about: It's a simple, stylish and easy web template for personal freelancers and any kind of business owners that would like to showcase their portfolio beautifully. This template has a minimal design. Responsive mobile template could be the noble choice for any website, mobiles or tablet

works.title: Elena
works.about: It's a web template with big header. Can be used for e-mail to introduce company, or news from your website. It’s fully responsive design, looks stunning on any device and perfect for showcasing your work. This template doesn't contain difficult element, or animation in this case speed of download this site is very fast

works.title: DarkGames
works.about: This Theme is perfect game review websites with 3 Columns, Dark Black Vector Background, Black, Gray and Orange Colours, Fixed Width, Rounded Corners, Nice Top Header Flash Banner, Left Sidebar and Right Sidebar. It supports all kinds of browsers and quick download options, it has fixed width

works.title: Author
works.about: Good example of clean, sharp and simple style suited for personal portfolios as well as corporate and business websites. It’s a great start for your brand. Nice graphic elements. Designed in simple style that would cover the basic needs to any company or person that looks clean and simple website template

works.title: Acrostia
works.about: It's the perfect one page responsive template for corporate, creative studio, portfolio, agency, nonprofit or general business. Template are professional elements in clean-clear-simple design with creative style and smooth navigation. It’s fully responsive design, looks stunning on any device and perfect for showcasing your work

works.title: Marble
works.about: It's a flat, responsive, HTML5 site template with unique portfolio. Marble will be useful for artists, photographers, creative agencies, digital studios, personal freelancers, and any kind of business owners that would like to showcase their portfolio beautifully. Since it is responsive, the layout will adapt to different screen sizes which will make your website be compatible with any device such as smart phones, tablets or desktop computers

works.title: Landing page
works.about: It's a simple and clean responsive template great for advertising or selling your app, software, retail product or service. It is build using Bootstrap grid and uses only free Google fonts. The code is well commented for easy customization

works.title: Happy handyman
works.about: Handyman has handy hands. This is exactly what our professional template will demonstrate to your customers. It will attract them not only with a harmonic structure and convenient navigation, but also impress with conceptual photos and icons

works.title: FreeElegance
works.about: It’s a simple template with fixed width for your blog or news website. Contain simple carousel, and a lots of news blocks with pictures and “Learn more” buttons. The simple decision of design provide fast download of template, that can contain a lot text information. Footer can have social connects and latest news

works.title: Lispum Media
works.about: It’s a responsive template with light design and big video-section. Some description section, partners, contacts sections. Responsive template without any grid-system, but compatible with all devices

works.title: Orange Rabbit
works.about: It’s a simple template with fixed width for your blog or news website. Contain big sections of team and contacts. Fast download and simple design
